articles.author: Jennifer Hiller and Liz Hampton
articles.title: U.S. shale producers to tap brakes in 2020 after years of rapid growth
articles.description: Vastly slower U.S. oil growth this year and the prospect of a plateau for the world's top oil producer have signaled a new and unfamiliar era of self-restraint for the go-go shale industry.
articles.content:
HOUSTON (Reuters) - Vastly slower U.S. oil growth this year and the prospect of a plateau for the world’s top oil producer have signaled a new and unfamiliar era of self-restraint for the go-go shale industry.

articles.author: Julie Zhu
articles.title: Exclusive: China halts British stock link over political tensions - sources
articles.description: China has temporarily blocked planned cross-border listings between the Shanghai and London stock exchanges because of political tensions with Britain, five sources told Reuters.
articles.content:
HONG KONG/LONDON (Reuters) - China has temporarily blocked planned cross-border listings between the Shanghai and London stock exchanges because of political tensions with Britain, five sources told Reuters.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: China's Hengyi runs new Brunei refinery near full rates: officials
articles.description: China's Hengyi Petrochemical Co Ltd is operating its new 160,000 barrels per day refinery in Brunei at near full capacity after trial production began in July, two company officials told Reuters.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE (Reuters) - China’s Hengyi Petrochemical Co Ltd is operating its new 160,000 barrels per day refinery in Brunei at near full capacity after trial production began in July, two company officials told Reuters. 
The plant in Palau Muara Besar is one o… [+1076 chars]
